body.p:
Pay Dist of Kentucky
Cincinnati May 23d 1864,,
Sir:

I am this day in receipt of authority from the Secretary of War for the payment of the 68th Regiment of the Enrolled Militia of Kentucky, for their period of service under the call of Col. Gallup of April 7th 1864.
Please cause the rolls to be forwarded to me here, and I will promptly provide for the payment

Very Respectfully
Your Obt Servant
John Coon
Acting Pay. Mr. in charge

Hon Thomas E. Bramlette
Governor of Kentucky
Frankfort
Ky.

68
Pay Dist of ky
Cincinnati
May 23rd 1864
Coon John Acting Pay- Master in charge.
Writes that he is authorized to pay 68th Reft E. M for services rendered under call from Col Gallup April 7th/64 and asking that rolls be forwarded to here

State Agent having been sent to pay off the 68th Rolls & Receipts will be forwarded as soon as he returns. L. B P 291-
Recd I. G. O. May 25th 1864
